scripts.clean: npx lerna clean --yes; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json packages/*/package-lock.json packages/*/dist packages/*/coverage packages/*/.nyc_output packages/*/.serverless packages/*/.webpack
scripts.cover: rm -rf .nyc_output/ coverage/ && npx lerna run cover && mkdir .nyc_output/ coverage/ && npx lerna exec -- "if [ -d "./.nyc_output" ]; then cp -rv .nyc_output ../..; fi;" && npx nyc merge ./.nyc_output coverage/coverage.json && npx nyc report --reporter=lcov --temp-directory coverage && ls -al .nyc_output && ls -al coverage
scripts.travis: npm run cover && npm run coveralls
